GSD.description:
Bluetooth: Fix use after free in hci_send_acl

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.189 by commit 3803d896ddd97c7c16689a5381c0960040727647. For more details please see the references link.
